resources.string: Swipe right to start the tutorial
Swipe left to skip the tutorial
Touch the circles to learn about the brain
Use your finger to move the brain around
Place the device on a friend\'s forehead to start
Move the device around your friend\'s head to see their brain!
Just follow the instructions in this mode to test your knowledge on the brain
Be sure to pay attention and try and get as many correct as you can!
You can use the buttons in the bottom right to make half the brain see-through or to colour in the brain!
3D Brain Model by A. M. Winkler is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. The original work can be found at http://brainder.org/brain-for-blender
Press play to go on a tour of of the brain!
BrainSlice is an app to teach children and adults alike about the brain.
